reviews.review: I thought there's going to be an Oldboy moment.

Masterpiece, Now i get it how this game is Infinite not 3. It's not what player expect from previous installment, You don't get the horror but thriller still gives player chills. Major different theme but gives you amazing experience that you didn't get in previous. The Plot & Gameplay 9.6/10

Me encanta bioshock, la verdad me entretuvo mucho mas que los 2 primeros ya que aqui se perfecciona mas la jugabilidad a un estilo mas arcaico y simple. 

Me encantan los vigorizadores, sobre todo el diseÃ±o y animacion de las botellas cuando te las tomas. 
Tambien cuando las utilizas contra enemigos hay algunas que son entretenidas de usar sobre todo la de los cuervos. 

A nivel narrativo tambien me gusta y me atrapo tanto la primera vez que lo jugue que me baje los DLC para terminar la historia.

Es un juego que me saco varias horas y es muy entretenido de jugar aunque la rejugabilidad es tosca ya que el juego te obliga a seguir la misma narrativa una y otra vez ininterrumpidamente y eso le quita un poco lo frenetico. Pero sin dudas lo disfruto bastante
el mejor puto juego que probe en mi vida

Great game. Gave the Bioshock series updated mechanics, a new setting, and a new philosophical critique without losing itself. Instead of a thought experiment critiquing the philosophies of Ayn Rand, this is a serious look at one logical extreme of American civic religion, while also incorporating and highlights a historical racial tensions (e.g. the Irish) that are unknown or forgotten by many Americans. Honestly the story has so many levels I can't cover them all in a review. This game has a very thought provoking story, I would say particularly so for an American audience, since the culture highlighted is so American, but also clearly morally problematic. Even if you're not particularly a fan of first-person shooters, the story line alone is worth it!

god dam that ending.... just wow

"The central focus of BioShock is the Cycle of Oppression. Ken Levine, the gamesâ€™ director, takes the player on a journey across time and space, and concludes that historically there are â€œconstants and variables.â€ White people along with their sense of nationalism and religion are always the prime movers of the Cycle of Oppression, while Jews and people of color are their victims. The latter may periodically engage in immoral behavior, but it is always in response to past oppression inflicted on them. BioShock Infinite uses a meta-design to attack the player both directly and indirectly, stating essentially that even if the player believes himself to be a good person who consciously adheres to the tenets of the new-age religion of egalitarianism, evil still resides within him waiting to be unleashed. He is in fact the very thing, he believes to be fighting against. In brief, BioShock Infinite conveys the message that the White male gamerâ€™s only path to redemption is death."         
-AmericanKrogan

Solo tengo una palabra, INCREIBLE, hace ya aÃ±os que jugue el primer bioshock en mi PS3 y a pesar de todo aun tengo muchos recuerdos de los lugares y personajes que aparecen ahi, pense que este bioshock iba a ser parecido al primero pero no es igual, lo cual no es malo, de hecho me gusto que sea algo distinto al primero, pero en fin, la historia me volo la cabeza y pense que no tenia nada que ver rapture con esta nueva ciudad llamada columbia, pero NOP estan relacionadas jajajaj y los DLC no se quedan atras, son todo un viaje de nostalgia que a cualquier fan de bioshock le encantara ver, compra asegurada capo.

Muy aburrido.El 2 le da mil vueltas.

I don't understand why everyone loves this game so much, I enjoyed the first two games, bioshock 2 was my absolute favorite.  The combat was fun and enjoyable at first, but everything about the games turns into a giant slog-fest that just becomes worse and worse the more i play it.  I am 10 hours in and i feel it could have ended, I just want it to end at this point.  The story at first was enjoyable, but now its just confusing and stupid with crisscrossed timey wimey bullshit.  I've had to quit multiple times because I just got TIRED and SICK of playing, and sigh every time I need to come back to finish the game.  The game isn't even difficult enough to call it a challenge.

Infinite is a masterpiece and will continue to be for infinity.

If you have never picked this game up before then I highly recommend you do so.

Great game and series. Haven't never fully finished this game on 360 and decided to play through the series after a sale. After finishing all 3 I see why this series is so critically acclaimed. If you haven't played through Bioshock I highly recommend. Each story takes roughly 8 hours to complete with many other things to do after completion. 10/10 series and game

A masterpiece. 

The plot story is amazing, mindblowing with a lot of worldbuilding, foreshadowing and hidden message.
The gameplay is also amazing and fun. Never expected FPS can be this good.
The VA are also great. 

Really recommended if you want a challenging FPS with heavy plot story

Not just this game, but the entire series is amazing. The story so captivating working so well and lets all the puzzle pieces fall into place so well. The music is beautiful and so well done. The game play and gun play tie in with its surrounding so well. What i'm saying is if you want a game series to get hooked onto and play then get these games.
Entertaining ideas, interesting characters, and a cool new location.
